choices: "Give yourself some more powerful moves."  (Special Attacks)
"See the true extent of your power!"  (Final Smash)
11.content:
NiGHTS strode down the seemingly endless hallway, clutching his head lightly. Ever since he left Nightopia, there had been a strange throbbing in his head, and while it wasn't painful, it was certainly getting annoying. In addition, he felt much heavier; he couldn't even fly now, only hover a foot or so above the ground. He looked around the corridor for his room--lo and behold, there it was. Room 005. Taking a deep breath, he opened the door and strode into the room.

"Hey, NiGHTS! I've been expecting you!" A familiar voice boomed over an intercom system.
"Hey...is that..."
"Surprised?"
"Sonic! How ya doing, old pal!" NiGHTS shouted through the large testing chamber, his voice echoing all the way up to where Sonic watched in a control room.
"I'm fine, thanks for asking, but we can sit around and sip tea later. Right now, it's test time, but no pressure; I made it through, and so can you! Start off by showing us some basic attacks, like punches and kicks."

NiGHTS quickly lashed off some attacks. He was quite speedy, but his delicate hands weren't very powerful. Even at this stage, Sonic could tell NiGHTS would have a lot of finesse. "Alright, next we'll do something a bit more important, something every fighter has to be able to do..."
11.title: NiGHTS

12.content:
"Well, here's your room buddy."
Tails looked at the large door in front of him marked with a C.
"Are you sure about this Sonic?"
"Sure, you're just as strong as all the peopleI faced here last time. Remember I'm judging in room G. I'll try and catch ya at lunch, okay? Gotta go!" and Sonic was off before Tails could say anything else.
"Well, here goes..." Tails thought
12.title: Tails

121.content:
When Tails entered the room, all the others were already there. He only saw one he recognized.
"Hi, NiGHTS!"
"Tails! Fancy us being in the same room, ey?"
Tails quickly got to know the others, who were as follows

-Rachet & Clank
-Waluigi
-Meowth
-Banjo & Kazooie
-Bart Simpson
-Jaden Yuki
-Sora
-Pac-Man

Suddenly, three more people entered the room.
"Good Morning," Said one, "We are to be your judges for this Competition. My name is Ike. These are Falco, and Yoshi. Over the next several weeks, you shall be 10 tests to prove your worth." "I have only one thing to say," said Falco "Good luck, 'cause you're gonna need it."
121.title: Go in room

1213.content:
Suddenly a princess teleported by the door.

"Hmm...Excuse me Ike?" she said.

"Yes, Zelda?"

Zelda fiddled with her fingers, and then said, "It's the Rabbids."

"Again?"

"Yes, they went rabbid again."

Before Tails could enjoy the little pun, he heard screaming outside the room. A shopping cart bolted through the hallway, almost hitting Zelda.

Ike sighed, putting his hand to his face, and said, "Zelda, get the meds."

"We ran out."

"What? Now we're in trouble."

Tails thought for a little bit. How can he help?
1213.title: Rabbids

12131.content:
You thought for a moment and then asked, "Can I help?"

Ike responded, "Well...I suppose so,"

Zelda butted in, "However, the only way we can feed them the meds is catching them in Snake's box, strapping them in, and punching them in the stomach until they yell 'Daaaa!' and shoving the pills down the stomach."

"You got carried away again."

"Oops, sorry. You can try, but.."

You run out of the room before Zelda finished the sentence and you took out a reciever out of nowhere. You dialed a few numbers and call:
12131.title: Go After the Rabbids

121311.content:
You hear the roar of the X-Tornado zooming in on the building. However, you figured out that you won't be able to fly down the hallway with it. You would either crash or get disqualified.

You were cursing your luck when suddenly the Rabbids turned the corner and headed towards you. One was holding a toliet plunger and yelling out, "Daaaa!".

Suddenly, by luck, the X-Tornado burst through the wall, and hit the Rabbid's shopping cart.
121311.title: The X-Tornado

1213111.content:
Ike and Zelda were gaping at you as you return to your room. You thought that they might had been mad, but they were surprised instead.

"Err..." Ike said, "You...win this round."

"What?" you exclaimed.

Zelda started to explain, "We had the meds with us, but the Rabbid's were disqualified yesterday. Since we didn't want to let someone advance without doing anything, we decided to turn them into a challenge. You won, and therefore you advance to the next round."

"Thank you," you shake both of their hands vigorously. What now?
1213111.title: You Are "A" Winner

12131112.content:
As you walk through the halls you realize how much is going on, you hear someone shouting "BIG DEAL! YOU'RE NAME IS MARIO! NO ONE CARES!
(it sounded like bowser.) you hear kirby going "HiiiiiIIIIiiii. <(ºvº)>." "hello." you respond Kirby: (v-_-) "What?" you ask. then he explains "thats my taunt, if you do that outside of a battle that means you are challenging them to a battle."
12131112.title: Go Find Sonic

121311121.content: "items or no items." kirby asked" "What?" you ask. "ugh newcomers. come with me." you follow kirby into a huge room with all these weapons and other objects. "lets have weapons." kirby said. "it's going to be a stock match inside the halb..." "why do you get to make the rules?" the character whose been here longest always chooses. so are there any other newcomers?" kirby replied. "well there's Eggman, kool-aid-man..." Kool aid man?"kirby interuptted. " he's not a video game charecter. never mind lets get back to the battle. it will take place in the halberd." you find you're self in this huge battleship, but its floating. *this part has been cut out due to the first rule* //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ///////////////////////
121311121.title: battle kirby

choices: hope that all that Kool-Aid will keep them occupied.
121312.content:
You press the "random" button on a remote and a robot comes up to you, you tell it to chase the Rabbids and its response was " Does not compute!" and then it combusted. "forget this." you say and click the button for the X-Tornado. Shortly after a large figure bursts through the wall. "That was quick." you respond. when the debris settles, you see that the figure was not the X-Tornado. suddenly a random voice exclaimed "Newcomer: Kool-Aid Man!"
"Oh." you groan. Then the X-Tornado swoops through the hole Kool-Aid Man had created and shattered Kool-Aid Man, sending Kool-Aid everywhere. The Rabbids saw his and started licking it up.
121312.title: One of Tail's Other Inventions

1213121.content: You grab Snake's box and slam it on the two Rabbids, then duct-tape it to the ground. then you leave it there, to wait for the Meds to arrive. Then Snake came and saw his box duct-taped to the ground and shouted "Very funny guys, who did it this time?" then when he lifted up the box the rabbids shouted "DAAAAAAAAH!" and tackled Snake.
1213121.title: Trap the Rabbids.

1213122.content: You were right, the Rabbids, not watching where they're going, fall through the hole Kool- Aid Man, now in trophy form (thats what happens when SSB characters die outside of battle.) had created and fell 15 feet to the ground and turned to trophies. then another hole got blasted into the wall, "are the rabbids back" you thought. Wrong. the random voice that announced Kool-Aid Man's appearance now said "Newcomer: Eggman" "Another sonic character" Ike replied "his series must be getting a lot more fans than we thought." "Ho ho ho ho ho." Eggman chuckled. Lucas was walking down the hallway and heard Eggman's laugh. He looked around the corner and saw Eggman. "santa's real?" lucas said. " I'm NOT Santa!" Eggman Shouted back. " but you're fat, you wear red and you say Ho ho ho." lucas replied. "But you will find I am not to jolly ." Eggman shot back, then eggman clicked a botton and a laser appeared on the Egg-Pod. as he was charging it, you revive Kool-Aid Man, but before he could say "OH YEAH!" you kick him into the laser.his glass breaks and once again Kool-Aid goes flying everywhere and some of it gets in the Egg-Pod's wires. and the Egg-Pod blows up. leaving eggman as a trophy.
1213122.title: hope that the Kool-Aid will keep them occupied.

choices: Carmilita is a back up incase of a no show
14.content:
"Is this right? An invitation to 'smash'?" Sly wondered as he opened a letter addressed to him. "Super Smash Bros. is a Nintendo competition. Is it a mistake or a trap? Only one way to find out. I am entering. I can invite three guests. I know Murray would to come. Bentley would probably accept. The question is 'who else should I invite?' Maybe Carmelita?" Sly thought about the letter. A few seconds later, Sly's friends Bentley and Murray showed.

"Sly, is that what I think it is?" asked Murray.

"Yes, it is an invitation to smash. You're invited as two of my three guests," Sly replied.

"Besides all the fighters from the old games, there are going to be other new comers. Rick Taylor from Splatterhouse, Axel Stone from Streets of Rage, Giygas from Earthbound, Krystal from Star Fox, and Joe from Viewtiful Joe are just a few newcomers to receive invitations. Rick will bring the Terror Mask with him to increase his strength if he shows up. Axel knows Martial Arts. Giygas' power is an alien with incomprehensible power. Krystal will bring her staff to separate her from the other Star Fox pilots. Viewtiful Joe has VFX powers. I don't know how many people who received invitations will actually show up, but if you join, you might not know who you are going to encounter." Bentley informed Sly.

"Except the fighters from the first game are guaranteed," Sly added. "Anyway, I plan to invite Carmelita," Sly said as he began typing up an email to send to her.

"Sly, it might be possible she got an invitation to fight, a complete list hasn't been revealed," Bentley mentioned.

"Well, this will make sure she shows up," Sly added as he sent the email he just finished typing out.

When Sly arrived for the event with his friends, he saw Carmilita.
14.title: Sly Cooper

145.content: Who invited her if it wasn't Sly?
145.title: An invititation from someone else

152.content:
Megaman Looked up at the room he was going into. Room B. He gulped and entered.
He looked around, but no one he recognized, but soon he everyone as follows.
-Paper Mario
-Rayman
-King K.Rool
-The Baby Heroes (Baby Mario, Baby Luigi, Baby Peach, and Baby Daisy)
-Bomberman
-Chun Li
-Ryu
-Krystal
-Louie
-Cloud
-Knuckles
-and all the Koopa Kids (Including Bowser Jr.)

They all were talking until they heard a bell. "All right-a! Listen-a up!" Mario shouted. "Welcome to the Smash Bros Preliminaries. Here, you and several others, are trying to get in one of the greatest fighting game series ever." went Fox. Gannon stepped in and started talking. "Mario, Fox, Pikachu, and I, will judge you and decide wether you are in or out!" "We're gonna have a lot of fun and fighting here!" Pikachu shouted while jumping. (Note: Pikachu's words will be translated) Fox stepped in saying "We also have a lot of people that have already gotten prevoiusly." and with that statement. Most people looked around wondering 'Who got in already?' Mario smiled, "Would you like to reveal yourselves, those who are already in?" said Mario, winking. Just then, Krystal, Louie, and Chun Li stood up. "These are the 3 that have made it here," said Pikachu nodding. "These 3 will help you pass." "And with that, we will begin your way to try to get in to SUPER SMASH BROS!" The 4 said in Unison.

Everyone cheered and jumped for joy! "Now," Mario said, silencing them all. "We will start by a simple battle, Pikachu here will call 2 of you to a battle! Pikachu nodded and Pointed at 2 people.
Pikachu pointed at Megaman, and....
152.title: Megaman's first day

1523.content:
Megaman and Knuckles walked to the stage with the others all watching them. Megaman was thinking to himself, he had 8 of all of his past weapons ready for use. The metal blades, gemini laser, shadow blades, pharaoh shot, skull barrier, charge kick, yamato spear, and lastly, the black hole bomb. Mario stated " After 3 minutes of fighting, me and the other-a judges will see who should go on. Ok-a, ready? 3! 2! 1! Go-a!" Megaman wasted no time as changed to the shadow blades and whipped them at knuckles. Knuckles swiftly dodged them and swept forward, punching Megaman. Megaman fell to the ground, what seemed like a flash, metal blades forced knuckles to trip backwards and fall to the ground. They fought for what seemed like hours when the heard a loud buzz.
" Finish-a! Ok, we will now determine the winner between the judges." Megaman and knuckles stood hoping for the best. Then they heard fox say " The winner is.... Megaman! Loud cheers were heard, as a couple of boos were being yelled. " Knuckles, "calmly said Ganondorf " you will still be in the games, but this is the beginning for difficult battles. Knuckles look down, feeling ashamed. Mario instructed them to go to where they would be staying, and everybody was assigned a room and a roommate.Megaman had Bomberman as a roommate, and they were friends.
Megaman was walking through the halls that evening when he saw three koopalings causing trouble they were...
1523.title: Knuckles

15233.content: Ludwig, Lemmy, and Roy Koopa were stacking up boxes when Megaman ask them "what are you up to?". The koopalings grinned and Lemmy said "Nothing for you to know!" Then out of nowhere, a voice said "stop right there you three!' Behind Megaman two people stood then they came out. They were...
15233.title: Ludwig, Lemmy, Roy. What are they up to?

justin observer is one of MY characters that i made up along time ago.
he came from earth but was given the power to leap from one world to another.
he is drawn wherever his evil brother, Shade, is causing havoc (which happens to be the Smash Bros. tourney.)
justin observer weilds a thin but sharp rapier (Shade has a broad sword).
just go with it.

and trust me....
15531.title: who is justin observer and shade???

155311.content:
theres a ripple of time and space as a man steps forward seemingly from nowhere and quickly glances around.

"so...this is where the stadium is...where the tourney is being held..."he states to himself.

"my brother has to be around here somewhere..."he adds quietly.

"hello? is someone there?"a voice calls.

"oh, great..."
155311.title: right in the middle of it

1553112.content:
fox mcloud step around the corner and spies justin.

"who are you?" he asks.

"me? i'm noone important. just an observer."
"Justin Observer?"
"you catch on quick"

"what are you doing here? the battle dome is ussually only open to contestants."

"you're looking at one"

fox blinks in surprise.

"youre one of the contestants?"

"i sure am. my brother, Shade, is also competing. it's him i need to see, really."justin replies, looking around as if Shade were going to stumble along.
1553112.title: it's fox!

15531122.content:
alas, no Shade.

fox looked perplexed.

"well, if you're both here to compete, you'll meet up soon enough, i think."fox assures him.

"i hope i can get to him before he gets to anyone else..." justin said silently to himself.
15531122.title: he doesn't

155311221.content:
a man dressed in dark black and purple clothing stumbles out of a closing rift just fast enough to stop his brother from following right away.

"great...out of juice again." he grumbles to himself.

"at least i bought myself a few solid hours...." he adds.

it was then that Shade, for of course it was he, first took notice of his surroundings.

"so...the battle dome,huh?"he muses to himself.

"who's that?"

"damn!!!"
155311221.title: two hours ago....

1553112211.content:
a woman suddenly leaps from behind a corner, gun in hand, aiming right for Shade.

"hey,hey!! friend!!"shade, shouts, hands above his head.

"who are you? how did you get in here?"samus questions, walking slowly towards him.

"my name is Shade, and i'm a contestant at this tourney."Shade adlibs, spoting the large banner hanging in the hallway.

samus' eyes go wide with surprise.

"oh! another contestant?"she says, suddenly very aware of the warm weapon in her grasp.

she hurridly holsters the blaster, alittle embarassed.

"sorry bout that, friend."she offeres her hand sheepishly.

"i'm samus, a long-time contestant."she adds.

"no worries"Shade replies, accepting the gesture.

"when did you arrive?"she asks.

"a few days ago"he lies."i heard of this tourney from a friend, and decided i should give it a go."

"well...that's cool, i guess...i gotta go, though."she says,heading past him down the hall."it was nice meeting you."she adds.

"you as well."Shade replies.

"see ya out there!"she says, waving as she rounded the corner, out of sight.

"yes..."Shade says in deep undertones.

"you will......"
1553112211.title: samus...
